channel.title: Components in need of a maintainer / rewrite
channel.description:
Hi I am looking to use some of my free time to help out with Whonix development
I am looking for current components in need of a maintainer or a complete rewrite
Thanks.

item.title: Components in need of a maintainer / rewrite
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Script / programming languages? CLI or GUI?

Let’s start with something small, simple? Sure, “small” and “simple” are relative terms.

Maybe anon-connection-wizard / tor-control-panel. Doesn’t have any maintainer.

Perhaps try improving the situation for the following?

Suggestion: generate new bridge lines automatically in tor-control-panel Support
Hi. Tor is blocked in my area so I need to use bridges. Bridge nodes are very unstable so they can suddenly turn off. Generally, there are two ways to configure bridge lines: obfs4 (recommended) - this option automatically adds generated obfs4 bridge lines to torrc file and then starts bootstrapping process Manually add bridge lines - very inconvenient. Need to visit Tor Project site every time and solve captcha in order to get new bridge lines. But the problem is when I select obfs4 (recomme…
GitHub

GitHub - Kicksecure/tor-control-panel: Tor controller

Tor controller. Contribute to Kicksecure/tor-control-panel development by creating an account on GitHub.

GitHub

GitHub - Kicksecure/anon-connection-wizard

Contribute to Kicksecure/anon-connection-wizard development by creating an account on GitHub.

Read full topic
